original_title: Attack of the Killer Popcorn: Orville's Awakening
overview: A group of movie theatre employees try to summon the spirit of a dead employee to find out where he placed the company card before he died, so they can order pizza.
tagline: These Popcorn Prices Will Cost More Than An Arm And A Leg
title: Attack of the Killer Popcorn: Orville's Awakening
